```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
house_prices <- read_csv("kc_house_data.csv")
```

```{r}
house_prices %>% 
  summary()

```

```{r}
# removing uneccary variables after checking them out 
# Did not remove date as it might affect the house price? 
# Converted waterfront to logical
# Converted renovated to a logical variable
# Grade it interval as it is a scale
# condition is ordinal 
house_prices_tidy <- house_prices %>% 
  mutate(renovated = ifelse(yr_renovated == 0, 0, 1), waterfront = as.logical(waterfront)) %>% 
  select(-c("id", "sqft_living15", "sqft_lot15", "zipcode", "yr_renovated")) 

```

```{r}
# Could not work out how to use alias? 
house_prices_tidy %>% 
  alias("price" ~ .)
```
